value:
Prince Alfonse loaned me a robe to
ward off the sun. But I'm embarrassed
to admit...$k$pIt took me the better part of a day to
realize I had put it on inside out.

I won a battle and the prize was a trip
to a tropical island. I wasn't interested,
but my retainers earned a vacation.

Is the heat getting to you? A freshly
squeezed glass of tomato juice will
help with that.

I'd like to see Askran beaches after
the sun has set. The nighttime sea is
like a blanket of darkness.$k$pIt's a rather beautiful sight. Don't you
agree?

Me? I was reading treatises on
botany—summer vegetation
specifically.$k$pIt seems there are many varieties
of tomato plants in other lands...

Fine greetings from
$Nf. I'm glad
I can wait indoors.$k$pIf left outside, I might start to tan.

Such results despite this outfit?
Maybe it's not so bad after all.

Pretty impressive for fighting in a
swimsuit, don't you think?

If you are disappointed by these
results, then give me clothes.

Thanks for the extra power. But I
would rather have extra clothes.

I'm Leo, Prince of Nohr. And you
pulled me off a tropical island. Do you
expect me to fight in this outfit?

You seem to be holding up well,
despite the heat. You're always
wearing that hooded robe...$k$pAre you trying to avoid the sun as
well?$k$pThe sun can burn me in an instant so
I avoid it at all costs. I'd rather not be
colored red from head to toe.$k$p...I beg your pardon? You say I'd look
like a tomato if that happened?
How in the world do you...$k$pCome up with such amazing ideas?!
How could I possibly hate looking like
something I so cherish?$k$pMaybe I'll go get some sun right now.$k$pYou think...that's a bad idea? Well, if
that's your advice, I'll take it. But you
have given me food for thought.
えい
はっ
わわっ！
Hey!
I'll throw your ashes to the waves!
Tr-tropical attack!
I'll sink you!
Drown in blood!
Vacations...
Heh
Tanlines. What torture!
Hot beaches? Hate them.
Tropical islands? Forget it. And this swimsuit! Don't even get me started!
I actually like walking a beach at night. But swim? In the ocean? With my body?
Now, tomato juice, that I like. There's nothing more refreshing.
I guess I should get some gifts for my retainers.
Hey, if you like tropical islands, that's fine. Maybe it's not as bad as I say.
OK.
Tans...
So...hot.
What?! I can't wear this! It's disgraceful!
